participant_1.background:
I live in a house with my bass guitar named Big Bertha.
I was single for a long time before I met my current boyfriend.
I spend my day reminiscing about my childhood and cherishing the close bond I have with my family.
i m entering the police academy this summer.
I am ready to work, but my car is not.

participant_2.background:
I secretly want to be a professional athlete, but I know my parents would never approve.
i am the leader of the french fry research department at del taco.
i have the gene that lets me know when someones eaten asparagus.
I juggle for a living in a circus, and I come from a small town in the Midwest.
I start my day early, walk my dog, and then work on my tasks until late at night, listening to music about animals.

content.text: Hello!
Hi! How's it going?
It's going well! I'm preparing to enter the police academy this summer.
Oh that's awesome! What made you want to become a police officer?
I've always wanted to help people, and I think being a police officer is a great way to do that.
That's a great reason! I think you'll be a great police officer.
Thanks, I appreciate that!
What do you think it'll be like when you first start?
I'm a little nervous, but I'm also excited. I think it'll be a lot of hard work, but I'm ready for it.
I'm sure you'll do great!
Thanks! I hope so!
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to play music, spend time with my family and friends, and I love to cook.
That's cool! I like to juggle, walk my dog, and listen to music about animals.
Juggling sounds like a cool skill! I've always wanted to learn how to do it.
It's not as hard as it looks! I'm sure you could learn if you wanted to.
Maybe I will!
You should! It's a lot of fun.
I'll think about it!
Cool! So, what kind of music do you like to cook to?
I like to cook to all kinds of music, but I especially like to cook to jazz and classical music.
That's interesting! I've never thought about cooking to music before.
I think it helps me to relax and focus on the task at hand.
That makes sense! I might have to try that sometime.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
I will!
Great
